description: Meet your next go-to sweatshirt. The Heritage Wordmark Crew is built to last; it's constructed from high-quality, organic brushed back cotton fleece that feels soft and comfortable next to skin. A slightly oversized cut makes the Heritage Crew super comfortable and easy to wear. Embroidered logos are low-key and reinforce the high-quality construction.
name: Black Diamond Heritage Wordmark Crewneck - Mens
